type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.DebugOptions
type.description: Debug options for Java compilation. Only take effect if CompileOptions#debug is set to true.

method.name: getDebugLevel
method.description:
Tells which debugging information is to be generated. The value is a comma-separated list of any of the following keywords (without spaces in between):
source
Source file debugging information
lines
Line number debugging information
vars
Local variable debugging information
By default, only source and line debugging information will be generated.

method.name: setDebugLevel
method.description: Sets which debug information is to be generated.

property.name: debugLevel
property.description:
Tells which debugging information is to be generated. The value is a comma-separated list of any of the following keywords (without spaces in between):
source
Source file debugging information
lines
Line number debugging information
vars
Local variable debugging information
By default, only source and line debugging information will be generated.
